sys_update_xml.name: sys_widgets_e354ff31db61030059d0d001cf961963
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_widgets"><sys_widgets action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><name>UI Page Homepages</name><order>100</order><renderer/><renderer_type>javascript</renderer_type><roles/><script><![CDATA[function sections() {
    return {
		//exmaple 'Title for widget instance': {'what type of widget, in this case uiPageName':'Name of actual UI page'}
        //example 'SNOW Admin Homepage': { 'uiPageName' : 'UI_page_homepage_admin'}
		//,'widget_name2': {'uiPageName': 'UI_page_name'}
    };
}

function render() {
    var uiPageName = renderer.getPreferences().get("uiPageName");
    return renderer.getRenderedPage(uiPageName);
}

function getEditLink() {
    return "sys_ui_page.do?sysparm_query=name=" + renderer.getPreferences().get("uiPageName");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_widgets</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jdeluna</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-02 20:06:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>e354ff31db61030059d0d001cf961963</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UI Page Homepages</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_widgets_e354ff31db61030059d0d001cf961963</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jdeluna</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-02 20:06:59</sys_updated_on><top_level_category>false</top_level_category></sys_widgets></record_update>
